name: Leo Dorst
content: Homepage of Leo Dorst Leo Dorst (l.dorst@@uva.nl) Computer Vision Group Informatics Institute Faculty of Sciences University of Amsterdam Amsterdam, The Netherlands Join us at AGACSE 2024, August 26-29 ! research: complete publications in curriculum vitae linked publications: GoogleScholar, ResearchGate geometric algebra /clifford algebra, not maintained, better use bivector.net the book: Geometric Algebra for Computer Science or its mirror site interview for CNMAC 2019, Uberlandia, Brazil 2005 Inventor of the Year award teaching: lineaire algebra (1st year BA course), zie Canvas (tot 2025) docent uitgelicht: Leo Dorst reading club Kanatani (2009) nominated and shortlisted as UvA Lecturer of the Year 2008 reading club Hartley and Zisserman (2008) zoeken, sturen en bewegen (I-2c BA course) computer vision (II-1c BA course) (tot 2022) inleiding robotica (I-1b BA course) (tot 2007) reactief gedrag bij mens en machine> (I-1a,b BA course) (tot 2005) Ba-level: robotica (tot 2003) Ba-level: perceptie van machines (tot 2003) MSc-level: beeldanalyse voor computersystemen (tot 2003) MSc-level: organisatie en ontwerp van autonome systemen (tot 2003) PhD-level: computational geometry (ASCI course a20) (tot 2008) applied math problems afstudeerstages hobbies: go, go world index, my game on YouTube (3 parts) lego, latest feat in Maak indruk op je kinderen (2007) geometry with cinderella geomag constructions de geschiedenis van ons huis (in Dutch) dr.ir.L.Dorst Room L4.53 Science Park 900 1098 XH Amsterdam The Netherlands 31-20-525 7461 (secr)
